statements: DELETE FROM healthcare_records WHERE record_id = 1001 AND patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM healthcare_records WHERE treatment_plan LIKE '%surgery%';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F' AND address LIKE '%Chicago%';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' AND patient_id NOT IN (SELECT patient_id FROM medical_records);
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND doctor = 'Dr. Smith';
DELETE FROM appointments WHERE doctor = 'Dr. Brown' AND appointment_date = '2022-09-15';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 2002 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM appointments WHERE appointment_type = 'Follow-up');
DELETE FROM medical_staff WHERE staff_id NOT IN (SELECT staff_id FROM appointments);
